"Oh my? Oh my, my my my?!": "Hm--Wahh! Y-You scared me!"
"Hehehe. There's no need to be so scared, silly! Lisa is a respectable member of ARKS, you know?"
"ARKS or not, I think anyone would get startled if they suddenly saw someone standing behind them like that..."
"If that happened to Lisa, she would've immediately shot them without hesitation, you know?"
"That goes way beyond just being startled!"
"Hehehe. Lisa finds these innocent reactions quite refreshing! Are these new friends of yours?"
"Just be nice to them, okay?"
"You haven't changed a bit, Lisa."

"Not that it's any of Lisa's concern what people think of her."
"Yes, of course not! Whether it's 2 years or 100 years, no matter how much time passes, people don't change that easily, you know?"

"...Well, regardless of where you're from, if you're acquainted with <%me> then you must be alright, so it doesn't matter."
"...Uh, o-okay, then."

"Hmmm. That's too bad, you know? Shooting you would feel different from shooting ARKS, so Lisa wanted to see what it's like. Too bad."
